content.1: And thou shalt make an altar
content.2: And thou shalt make the horns of it upon the four corners thereof: his horns shall be of the same: and thou shalt overlay it with brass.
content.3: And thou shalt make his pans to receive his ashes, and his shovels, and his basons, and his fleshhooks, and his firepans: all the vessels thereof thou shalt make
content.4: And thou shalt make for it a grate of network
content.5: And thou shalt put it under the compass of the altar beneath, that the net may be even to the midst of the altar.
content.6: And thou shalt make staves for the altar, staves
content.7: And the staves shall be put into the rings, and the staves shall be upon the two sides of the altar, to bear it.
content.8: Hollow with boards shalt thou make it: as it was shewed thee in the mount, so shall they make
content.9: And thou shalt make the court of the tabernacle: for the south side southward
content.10: And the twenty pillars thereof and their twenty sockets
content.11: And likewise for the north side in length
content.13: And the breadth of the court on the east side eastward
content.16: And for the gate of the court
content.17: All the pillars round about the court
content.19: All the vessels of the tabernacle in all the service thereof, and all the pins thereof, and all the pins of the court,
content.20: And thou shalt command the children of Israel, that they bring thee pure oil olive beaten for the light, to cause the lamp to burn always.
content.21: In the tabernacle of the congregation without the vail, which
